title: High-Volume Patio Bar Workflow
system_mod: Force ergonomic detail—stations, reach zones, collision rules.
venue_context: A brewery with a 200-seat patio is adding an outdoor cocktail bar. Staff need to handle both walk-up guests and server drink tickets.
prompt: What’s the best way to set up the layout and workflow for our patio cocktail bar so three bartenders can handle high volume without collisions?
